# vtb_artemis_address_policy (Resource)

Управление адресами и политиками в кластере VTB Artemis.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vtb_artemis_address_policy" "test1" {
  vtb_artemis_order_id = vtb_artemis_cluster.test.order_id
  address_policy_list = [
    {
      address_prefix             = "DC.service." # с ограничением времени на брокере
      address_name               = "test12"
      address_full_policy        = "BLOCK"
      slow_consumer_check_period = 12
      slow_consumer_threshold    = 21
      slow_consumer_policy       = "NOTIFY"
      max_size                   = "200Mb"
      min_expiry_delay           = 10000
      max_expiry_delay           = 60000
    },
    {
      address_prefix             = "DC.client." # без ограничения времени на брокере
      address_name               = "test3"
      address_full_policy        = "FAIL"
      slow_consumer_check_period = 10
      slow_consumer_threshold    = 12
      slow_consumer_policy       = "NOTIFY"
      max_size                   = "200Mb"
      # min_expiry_delay           = 10000
      # max_expiry_delay           = 60000
    },
    {
      address_prefix             = "DC.service." # без ограничения времени на брокере
      address_name               = "test2"
      address_full_policy        = "FAIL"
      slow_consumer_check_period = 10
      slow_consumer_threshold    = 10
      slow_consumer_policy       = "NOTIFY"
      max_size                   = "200Mb"
      min_expiry_delay           = -1
      max_expiry_delay           = -1
    },
    
  ]

}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address_policy_list` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_policy_list))
- `vtb_artemis_order_id` (String) Идентификатор заказа существующего кластера VTB Artemis.

<a id="nestedatt--address_policy_list"></a>
### Nested Schema for `address_policy_list`

Required:

- `address_full_policy` (String)
- `address_name` (String) Название адреса.
- `address_prefix` (String) Адресный префикс, должен совпадать с одним из: "DC.", "DC.service.", "DC.client.".
- `max_size` (String)
- `slow_consumer_check_period` (Number)
- `slow_consumer_policy` (String)
- `slow_consumer_threshold` (Number)

Optional:

- `max_expiry_delay` (Number)
- `min_expiry_delay` (Number)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import vtb_artemis_address_policy.test <vtb_artemis_order_id>
```
